title: Hong Kong - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Required Documents
items: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months.
Recent photo with white background, size 35x45 mm.
Bank statement for the last six months with a minimum balance of 300,000.00 BDT.
Income tax certificate for the last 3 years.
Some specific documents are required for business persons or job holders.

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
